name: BoxBox
description:
Box Box is a totally accurate box delivery simulator. 

Features
Smash boxes and deliver them  to get more points!  Be careful with the fragile boxes, you're not paid for breaking those!
Flip boxes with "This way up" labels upside down to get bonus pr  Four different box priority levels: hold low priority (white tape) boxes for as long as you can to get more points and deliver high priority boxes (red tape) as fast as you can for a bonus!
Decorate your room with money you've earned by delivering boxes!
Turn on turbo mode and deliver boxes as fast as you can!
Personalize the UI by changing it's color theme!

Pay $2 or more when downloading or by becoming my Patreon supporter for exclusive in-game items

Download the game

  •  Follow me on Twitter for more updates
  •  Join my Discord server
  •  Support me on Patreon for exclusive items and a special Discord role
